oai_dc:dc.dc:title: David M. Dotson death record
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: David M. Dotson, Company K, 37th Tennessee Regiment, CSA, lost half of his right foot at the Battle of Franklin.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Franklin, Battle of, Franklin, Tenn., 1864;Confederate States of America--History; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Registers of dead
